properties.body:
NORTH AND SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
1. EXERCISE OF NAVAL CONTROL OF MARITIME TRAFFIC
   (COAMAS 13) 12 THRU 23 AUG.
   THE PRESENT INSTRUCTIONS APPLIES TO ALL NATIONAL
   AND FOREIGN MERCHANT VESSELS, THAT IN PERIOD
   121200Z TO 231500Z AUG VOLUNTEER TO PARTICIPATE
   IN THE MENTIONED EXERCISE OF NAVAL CONTROL OF
   MARITIME TRAFFIC AND ARE IN THE FOLLOWING SITUATIONS:
   A. IN TRANSIT, ENTERING AREA NORTH OR SOUTH OF EXERCISE.
   B. IN TRANSIT, INSIDE AREA OF EXERCISE, SEEKING
      A BRAZILIAN OR FOREIGN PORT.
   C. MOORED AT A BRAZILIAN PORT AND ESTIMATED TO
      LEAVE DURING PERIOD OF EXERCISE.
2. THE INFORMATION CONTAINED IN FORM FORMAT ALFA SHOULD
   BE TRANSMITTED, BY E-MAIL TO COMCONTRAM WITH COPY TO
   COMANDO DO DISTRITO NAVAL OF MARITIME AREA WHERE THE
   MERCHANT SHIP IS, WHENEVER THE SHIP IS UNDER ONE OF
   THE THREE SITUATIONS DESCRIBED ABOVE. THE FORMAT ALFA
   FORM IS AVAILABLE AT WWW.COMCONTRAM.MAR.MIL.BR.
   WHERE THE INTERESTED ONE CAN OBTAIN IT THROUGH LINK
   EXERCICIOS DE CNTM/TRANSOCEANIC/FORMAT ALFA IN PORTUGUESE
   AND ENGLISH LANGUAGES. THIS FORM MAY ALSO BE PROVIDED
   BY REPRESENTATIVES OF MILITARY ORGANIZATIONS INVOLVED IN
   THE EXERCISE TO THE MASTERS OF MERCHANT SHIPS AT BERTH.
3. NORTH MARITIME AREA - REPRESENTED BY COMMAND OF NAVAL
   DISTRICT 4 (OCA BRAS NORTH) IN NATAL, IN AREA BOUND BY
   04-30.5N 051-38.2W, 08-35.0N 048-00.0W,
   10-00.0N 048-00.0W, 10-00.0N 036-00.0W,
   07-40.0N 035-00.0W, 06-22.0S 016-00.0W,
   06-22.0S 010-00.0W, 18-30.0S 010-00.0W,
   18-30.0S 039-43.0W.
   PHONE: 55 91 3216 4030 / 4031, FAX: 55 91 3241 4700,
   E-MAIL: CNTM@4DN.MAR.MIL.BR OR CNTMEXER@4DN.MAR.MIL.BR.
4. SOUTH MARITIME AREA - REPRESENTED BY COMMAND OF NAVAL
   DISTRICT 5 (SOUTH OCA) IN RIO GRANDE, IN AREA BOUND BY
   18-30.0S 039-43.0W, 18-30.0S 010-00.0W
   34-00.0S 010-00.0W, 34-00.0S 048-27.0W,
   35-48.0S 050-10.0W, 34-00.0S 053-00.0W
   33-44.0S 053-22.0W.
   PHONE: 55 53 3233 6127 / 6129, FAX: 55 53 3233 1519,
   E-MAIL: CNTM@5DN.MAR.MIL.BR OR CNTMOF@5DN.MAR.MIL.BR.
5. NAVAL COMMAND CONTROL OF MARITIME TRAFFIC (COMCONTRAM)
   PHONE: 55 21 2104 6353 / 6351 / 6347 / 5337,
   FAX: 55 21 2104 6341, E-MAIL: CNTM@COTRAM.MAR.MIL.BR
   OR CONTROLE@COTRAM.MAR.MIL.BR.
6. CANCEL THIS MSG 231600Z AUG 13.
